name: Evil Caravans
description:
Chate, the protagonist of this game has lost everything to the evil caravans which killed all his family and friend and destroyed his bones, now he can only use his shotgun to move around, an he will destroy all the caravans, in an act of revenge.

Will he be able to avenge his family?

Use the arrow keys to shoot. Put resolution at 1280 x 720.
